mapper.insert: insert into sal_list (sal_list_no, emp_no, sal_list_total, sal_list_health, sal_list_ltcare, sal_list_national, sal_list_emp, sal_list_work, sal_list_local) values( sal_list_seq.nextval, #{empNo}, #{salListTotal}, #{salListHealth},#{salListLtcare}, #{salListNational}, #{salListEmp}, #{salListWork}, #{salListLocal})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sl.sal_list_no, sl.emp_no, sl.sal_list_total, sl.sal_list_health, sl.sal_list_ltcare, sl.sal_list_national, sl.sal_list_emp, sl.sal_list_work, sl.sal_list_local, a.attend_no, a.emp_no AS attend_emp_no, TO_CHAR(a.attend_start, 'YYYY-MM') AS attend_month, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.attend_start) AS rnum FROM sal_list sl INNER JOIN attend a ON sl.emp_no = a.emp_no WHERE sl.emp_no = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(a.attend_start, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth} ) WHERE rnum = 1;
